name: Premium Velvet Curtain - Navy Blue
detailDescription: Luxurious velvet curtains that add elegance to any room. Made from high-quality polyester velvet with a soft, plush texture. Features thermal insulation properties to keep your room warm in winter and cool in summer. Available in various sizes and comes with easy-to-install grommets.
careDescription: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Iron on low heat if needed.

name: Modern Curtain Rod Set - Brushed Nickel
detailDescription: Professional-grade curtain rod set with a sleek brushed nickel finish. Includes adjustable rod (48-84 inches), mounting brackets, screws, and decorative finials. Supports up to 20 lbs. Easy to install with included instructions and all necessary hardware.
careDescription: Wipe clean with a soft, dry cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners.

name: Decorative Throw Pillow - Geometric Pattern
detailDescription: Stylish decorative pillow featuring a modern geometric pattern. Made with premium cotton canvas cover and filled with hypoallergenic polyester fiber. Perfect for adding a pop of style to your sofa, bed, or chair. Includes hidden zipper for easy cover removal.
careDescription: Remove cover and machine wash cold. Tumble dry low or air dry. Do not wash pillow insert.

name: Blackout Curtain Panel - Classic White
detailDescription: High-quality blackout curtain panels that block up to 99% of light and UV rays. Triple-weave construction provides excellent noise reduction and energy efficiency. Perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, or home theaters. Rod pocket design fits standard curtain rods up to 2 inches.
careDescription: Machine wash cold separately. Hang dry or tumble dry on low. Do not bleach.

name: Adjustable Curtain Brackets - Heavy Duty
detailDescription: Heavy-duty adjustable curtain rod brackets designed for durability and strength. Made from solid steel with powder-coated finish. Adjustable projection from 3 to 5 inches. Each bracket supports up to 40 lbs. Includes mounting screws and anchors for drywall installation.
careDescription: Wipe with damp cloth if needed. Avoid harsh chemicals.

name: Luxury Memory Foam Pillow - Premium Comfort
detailDescription: Premium memory foam pillow designed for ultimate comfort and support. Contoured design supports neck and spine alignment. Hypoallergenic and dust mite resistant. Includes breathable bamboo cover that's soft and moisture-wicking. Standard size fits all pillowcases.
careDescription: Spot clean pillow only. Machine wash cover in cold water and tumble dry low.
